PEIRIS,​ Air Vice Marshal LALAKA (Retd) called home to rest. Beloved husband of Iromi,​ everloving father of Nayantara,​ loving father-in-law of Shameera,​ devoted grandfather of Rayan,​ son of late Lloyd and Malini,​ loving brother of Lakith,​ brother-in-law of Sherine,​ Kshamalee,​ Shireen & John,​ Nirmalee & Robin,​ Dinalee & Cecil,​ Viresh,​ Anoma,​ Shanez & Janaka,​ loved uncle of late Lakshan,​ Lanil and Shanilka. Remains lie at A.F. Raymonds,​ Borella on Friday & Saturday 26-27th April 2024 from 10 a.m. – 9 p.m. Cortege will lie at the family home from 10 a.m. on Sunday,​ 28th April at No. 2,​ Uyana Lane 1,​ Uyana,​ Moratuwa. Service will be held at Rawathawatte Methodist Church at 3 p.m. followed by a Service Funeral at the Moratuwa Public Cemetery,​ Methodist Section,​ Holy Emmanuel Church Road at 4 p.m.
